description: For a healthier family dinner that's ready in 20 minutes, try this nutritionally approved taco recipe.
name: Healthier Beef Tacos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small Macro Organic green capsicum, halved, deseeded, thickly sliced
500g Macro Grass Fed Australian beef mince
0.5 bunch Macro Organic coriander, leaves picked and stalks finely chopped
2 small Macro Organic gourmet tomatoes, finely diced
1 small Macro Organic avocado, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly spray a large non-stick frying pan and place over medium-high heat. Cook onion and capsicum for 4 minutes, stirring, or until onion has softened and capsicum is starting to char on edges. Transfer onion mixture to a bowl and cover to keep warm. Lightly spray pan with oil and return to heat. Cook mince for 4 minutes, breaking up with a wooden spoon, or until browned. Add chilli powder and cook for 1 minute, stirring, or until fragrant. Return onion mixture to pan and stir to combine. Remove pan from heat.
Place coriander stalks, tomato and cucumber in a medium bowl and stir to combine.
Top mince mixture with salsa, avocado and coriander leaves. Serve with tortillas and lime.
